name: Lustful Vampire
description:
Lustful Vampire is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This story is about how a jewel seeker was looking for a very expensive ring. But instead of a ring, she met a vampire who simply fucked her in all holes!
In this wonderful game you have to plunge into the story of a girl who has been looking for a very expensive ring for a long time and hard. She wanted to get this ring from the tomb and sell it. But there is no ring in the tomb. Instead, a real vampire sleeps there! The girl wakes up the vampire and he has no choice but to fuck her in all holes! Get real pleasure from a very simple gameplay and cool music.
Beautiful graphics!
Relaxing music!
Exciting sex scenes!
